answers.answer: I felt that way! But every week they are in there the stronger they are! And the sooner , hopefully, youll get to take your little man home! I have 24 more days, but my.doctor is inducing me on the 6th!! Due to preeclampsia. But...thats 37 weeks 1 day! Hopefully everything goes fast! Good luck to you(:
Yeah I hope he stays in a little longer, its just crazy to think he could literally be here at any time! Good luck with your induction! :)

question: 34 weeks today, 42 days left! And my doctor said after this point if little Harrison decides to come they won't stop my labor! I feel like this is super exciting, the end is so near!!!! Anybody else feel this way!?!?
title: Epps!
